description:
The heat`s on when Vetrix and Dextra duel in the jungle to decide who moves on to the World Duel Carnival semifinals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tron VS Droite: The Deadly Butterfly`s Invitation! A Life-or-Death Jungle Field
Tron vs Droite: Shichou no Sasoi! Inochigake no Mitsurin Field
トロンVSドロワ 死蝶の誘い! 命懸けの密林フィールド
